Detailed Description

A class to read data from xls file
based on the 'xlrd'

Example:
        fname = '/home/tomer/rain_projection/raw_data/a2_0.5.xls'
        foo = xlsread(fname)
        var = foo.get_cells('a3:a5', 'Sheet1')
